abstract: Preservationists urge Landmarks Preservation Commission to save Ambassador Grill and Lounge, restaurant built in One UN New York hotel, along with hotel's lobby, arguing for significance of Manhattan spaces' modernist design; effort to save 1976 architecture brings historic preservation attempts close to present-day structures.
lead_paragraph: Several groups are concerned about the possible demolition of the Ambassador Grill and Lounge and the lobby of the One UN New York hotel, both designed by the architect Kevin Roche.

headline.main: Preservationists Worry About the Future of 2 Manhattan Spaces
headline.print_headline: Preservationists Seek Protection for 2 Manhattan Spaces

snippet: Several groups are concerned about the possible demolition of the Ambassador Grill and Lounge and the lobby of the One UN New York hotel, both designed by the architect Kevin Roche.
